#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long i;
    scanf("%ld",&i);
    long ans=0;
    ans=i/5;
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    i%=5;
    ans=i/3;
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    i%=3;
    ans=i/2;
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    i%=2;
    ans=i;
    printf("%ld\n",ans);
    return 0;
}
